section.name: DataNucleus Analysis Platform
section.p: Data Analysis Platform is a Data Quality and Data Profiling product that supports RDBMS datastores, flat File, XML and MS Excel file formats for analysis. This product can be used for profiling of data, quality check (and correction), and analysis of data (statistical analysis, charts). You can use this product to check cardinality between different tables within one data source. All the above mention formats are interchangeable â€“ like from database query, XLS can be generated or an XML file can be mapped to XLS.

This product can also be used for random generation of data, populating database values, looking into database Metadata, fetching and storing data from/to database. In its present form it supports only one data source at runtime but in future - it will support multiple data source simultaneous.
